trans-unit.source: Blank line not allowed after arrow expression clause token

trans-unit.source: Blank line not allowed after constructor initializer colon

trans-unit.source: Consecutive braces must not have blank line between them
trans-unit.target: Tra parentesi graffe consecutive non devono essere presenti righe vuote

trans-unit.source: Struct contains assignment to 'this' outside of constructor. Make readonly fields writable.

trans-unit.source: Using directives must be placed inside of a namespace declaration
trans-unit.target: Le direttive using devono essere inserite all'interno di una dichiarazione di namespace

trans-unit.source: Using directives must be placed outside of a namespace declaration
